# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-105">合规性中心中的数据丢失防护 (DLP) 包括许多可供您在 DLP 策略中使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-106">本主题列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-108">此外，关键字和校验和等确凿的证据可用于识别敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-110">敏感信息类型需要以下订阅之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-113">敏感信息类型可在中使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-113">Sensitive information types can be used in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-114">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-114">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-115">通信合规性 polcies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-115">communication compliance polcies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-116">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-116">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-117">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-117">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-118">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-118">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-119">ABA 传送号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-120">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-121">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-121">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-122">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-123">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-124">以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-125">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-126">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-127">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-128">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-129">未格式化：以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-130">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-131">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-132">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-133">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-133">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-134">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-135">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-155">阿根廷国家标识 (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-157">八个数字，用点分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-157">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-158">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-159">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-160">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-161">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-161">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-162">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-163">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-163">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-164">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-165">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-166">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-167">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-168">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-168">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-169">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-170">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-182">澳大利亚银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-184">具有或不具有银行状态分支号码的6到 twn 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-184">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-186">帐号是6到10位数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-186">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-187">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-188">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-189">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-190">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-192">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-194">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-195">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-196">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-197">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-199">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-200">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-216">澳大利亚商业电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-216">Australia business number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-218">11个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-219">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-220">11个带可选分隔符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-221">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-222">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-223">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-224">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-225">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-226">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-227">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-229">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-232">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-233">找到 Keywords_australian_business_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-234">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-235">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-245">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-245">Australia company number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-246">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-247">9个带分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-247">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-248">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-249">九位数带分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-249">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-250">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-250">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-251">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-251">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-252">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-252">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-253">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-253">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-254">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-254">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-255">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-255">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-256">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-256">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-257">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-257">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-258">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-258">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-259">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-259">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-260">找到 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-260">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-261">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-261">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-262">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-262">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-272">澳大利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-272">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-273">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-273">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-274">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-274">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-275">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-275">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-276">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-276">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-277">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-277">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-278">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-278">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-279">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-279">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-280">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-280">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-281">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-281">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-282">4到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-282">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-283">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-283">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-284">9个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-284">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-285">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-286">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-286">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-287">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-288">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-288">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-289">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-289">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-290">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-290">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-291">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-291">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-391">澳大利亚医疗帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-391">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-393">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-393">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-394">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-395">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-395">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-396">第一个数字在范围2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-396">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-397">第九个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-397">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-398">第十位数字是问题位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-398">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-399">第十位数字 (可选) 是单个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-399">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-400">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-401">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-401">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-402">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-403">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-403">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-404">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-404">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-405">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-405">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-406">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-406">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-418">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-418">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-419">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-420">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-420">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-421">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-422">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-422">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-423">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-424">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-424">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-425">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-426">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-426">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-427">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-427">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-428">找到 Keyword_passport 或 Keyword_australia_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-428">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-462">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-462">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-463">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-463">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-464">8到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-464">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-465">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-465">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-466">通常显示空格的八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-466">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-467">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-467">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-468">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-468">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-469">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-469">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-470">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-470">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-471">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-471">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-472">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-473">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-473">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-474">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-475">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-475">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-476">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-476">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-477">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-477">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-478">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-478">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-480">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-480">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-481">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-481">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-482">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-482">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-483">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-483">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-484">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-484">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-485">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-485">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-486">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-486">withholding tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-487">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-487">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-488">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-488">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-489">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-489">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-490">奥地利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-490">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-491">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-491">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-492">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-492">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-493">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-493">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-494">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-494">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-495">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-495">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-496">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-497">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-497">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-498">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-499">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-499">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-500">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-500">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-501">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-501">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-518">奥地利身份卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-518">Austria identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-519">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-520">字母、数字和特殊字符的24个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-520">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-521">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-522">24个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-522">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-523">22个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-523">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-524">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-524">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-525">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-525">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-526">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-526">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-527">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-527">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-528">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-529">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-529">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-530">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-530">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-532">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-532">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-534">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-535">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-535">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-536">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-536">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-537">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号码 sensitiveinformation 类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-537">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-539">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-539">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-540">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-541">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-541">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-542">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-542">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-543">一个空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-543">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-544">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-544">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-545">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-546">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-546">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-547">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-548">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-548">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-549">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-549">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-550">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-550">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-551">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-551">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-552">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-552">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-553">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-553">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-554">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-554">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-555">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-555">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-556">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-556">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-557">österreichisch reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-557">österreichisch reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-558">奥地利社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-558">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-559">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-559">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-560">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-561">以指定格式表示的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-561">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-562">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-563">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-563">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-564">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-564">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-565">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-565">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-566">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-566">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-567">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-567">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-568">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-568">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-569">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-569">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-570">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-570">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-571">函数 "Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-571">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-572">_or_equivalent "找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-572">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-573">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-573">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-574">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-575">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-575">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-591">奥地利税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-591">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-592">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-593">9个数字，带可选连字符和正斜线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-593">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-594">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-594">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-595">9个带可选连字符和正斜线的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-595">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-596">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-596">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-597">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-597">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-598">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-598">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-599">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-599">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-600">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-600">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-601">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-602">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-603">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-604">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-604">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-605">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-605">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-606">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-606">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-607">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-607">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-608">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-608">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-631">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-631">Austria value added tax</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-632">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-633">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-633">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-634">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-635">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-635">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-636">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-636">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-637">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-637">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-638">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-638">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-639">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-639">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-640">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-640">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-641">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-641">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-642">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-642">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-643">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-643">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-644">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-644">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-645">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-645">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-646">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-647">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-647">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-648">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-649">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-649">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-650">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-650">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-651">找到 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-651">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-652">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-652">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-653">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-653">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-659">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-659">vat no.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-662">奥地利 vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-662">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-663">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-663">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-664">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-664">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-665">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-665">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-666">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-666">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-667">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-667">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-668">vat 标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-668">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-669">atu 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-669">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-670">uid 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-670">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-671">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-671">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-672">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-673">字符串 "DocumentDb"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-673">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-674">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-674">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-675">字符串 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-675">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-676">介于3-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-676">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-677">大于符号 ( # A0) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-677">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-678">86小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-678">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-679">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-679">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-681">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-683">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-683">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-684">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-684">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-685">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-685">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-700">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-700">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-701">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-702">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-702">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-703">com "或" cloudapp "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-703">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-704">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-704">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-705">net "和字符串" Password "或" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-705">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-706">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-706">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-707">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-707">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-708">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-708">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-709">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-709">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-710">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-710">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-711">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-711">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-712">字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-712">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-713">com "，" cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-713">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-714">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-714">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-715">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-715">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-716">介于1-300 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-716">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-717">字符串 "Password"、"password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-717">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-718">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-718">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-719">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-719">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-720">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-720">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-721">一个或多个不是分号的字符 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-721">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-722">分号 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-722">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-723">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-724">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-724">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-725">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-726">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-727">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-727">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-728">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-728">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-743">Azure IoT 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-743">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-745">字符串 "HostName"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "azure 设备"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-745">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-746">net "和" SharedAccessKey "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-746">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-753">字符串 "azure 设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-753">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-754">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-754">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-755">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-755">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-756">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-756">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-757">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-757">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-758">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-758">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-759">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-759">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-760">43小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-760">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-761">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-761">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-764">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-765">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-765">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-766">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-766">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-767">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-767">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />

  </Pattern>
</Entity>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-782">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-782">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-783">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-784">字符串 "userpwd ="，后跟一个字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-784">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-785">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-785">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-786">字符串 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-786">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-787">任何60小写字母或数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-787">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-788">引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-788">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-790">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-790">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-793">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-793">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-794">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-794">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-809">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-809">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-810">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-810">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-811">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-811">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-812">net "，后跟下面的模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-812">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-813">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-813">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-814">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-814">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-815">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-815">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-816">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-816">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-817">字符串 "password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-817">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-818">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-818">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-819">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-819">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-820">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-820">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-821">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-821">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-822">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-822">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-823">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-824">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-824">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-825">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-826">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-826">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-827">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-827">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-828">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-828">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-843">Azure SA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-843">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-844">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-845">字符串 "sig"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-845">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-846">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-846">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-847">字符串 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-847">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-848">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-848">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-849">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-849">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-850">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-850">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-851">介于43-53 个字符和小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-851">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-852">字符串 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-852">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-853">不是字母或数字的小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 的任意字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-853">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-854">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-855">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-855">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-856">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-857">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-858">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-858">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
