- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-873">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-873">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-874">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-874">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-876">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-876">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-877">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-877">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-880">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-881">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-881">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-898">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-898">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-899">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-899">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-900">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-900">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-901">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-901">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-902">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-902">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-903">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-904">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-904">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-905">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-905">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-906">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-906">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-907">字符串 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-907">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-908">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-908">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-909">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-909">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-910">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-910">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-911">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-911">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-912">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-912">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-913">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-914">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-914">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-915">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-916">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-916">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-917">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-917">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-918">正则表达式 **CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-918">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-919">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-919">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-937"> (通用) 的 Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-937">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-939">86的任意组合（以小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) ，在下面的模式中所列字符的前面或后面）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-939">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-941">0到大于号之一 ( # A0) 、撇号 ( ' ) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或数字标记 ( # ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-941">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-942">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-942">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-943">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-943">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-945">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-947">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-948">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-949">比利时驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-949">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-950">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-950">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-951">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-952">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-952">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-953">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-953">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-954">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-954">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-955">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-956">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-956">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-957">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-958">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-958">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-959">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-959">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-960">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-960">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-982">比利时国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-982">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-984">11位数加上可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-984">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-986">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-986">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-987">6个数字和两个可选句点（以 YY 为格式）。月.DD 出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-987">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-988">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-988">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-989">奇数的三个连续数字 (奇数，即使偶数) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-989">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-990">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-990">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-991">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-991">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-992">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-992">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-993">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-993">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-994">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-994">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-995">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-995">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-996">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-996">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-997">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-997">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-998">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-998">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-999">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-999">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1000">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1000">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1001">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1001">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1060">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1060">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1061">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1061">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1062">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1063">两个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1063">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1064">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1065">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1065">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1066">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1067">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1067">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1068">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1069">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1070">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1070">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1071">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1071">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1081">比利时社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1081">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1082">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1082">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1083">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1083">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1084">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1084">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1085">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1085">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1086">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1086">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1087">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1087">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1088">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1088">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1089">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1089">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1090">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1090">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1091">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1091">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1092">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1092">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1093">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1093">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1094">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1094">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1095">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1095">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1096">Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1096">Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1097">比利时国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1097">belgian national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1098">国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1098">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1099">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1099">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1100">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1100">nationalnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1114">比利时增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1114">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1115">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1116">12个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1116">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1117">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1118">12个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1118">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1119">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1119">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1120">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1120">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1121">数字0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1121">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1122">一个从1到9的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1122">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1123">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1123">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1124">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1124">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1125">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1125">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1126">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1126">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1127">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1128">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1128">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1129">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1130">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1130">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1131">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1131">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1132">找到 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1132">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1133">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1133">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1134">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1134">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1135">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1135">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1136">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1136">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1137">n º tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1137">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1138">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1138">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1139">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1139">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1140">numéro。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1140">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1141">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1141">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1142">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1142">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1143">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1143">btw</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1146">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1146">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1148">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1148">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1150">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1150">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1151">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1152">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1152">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1154">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1154">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1155">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1155">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1156">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1156">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1157">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1157">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1158">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1158">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1159">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1159">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1160">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1161">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1162">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1163">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1163">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1164">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1164">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1165">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1165">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1166">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1166">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1167">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1167">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1168">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1168">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1169">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1175">营业</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1175">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1176">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1176">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1177">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1177">Imposto</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1181">巴西法人编号 (CNPJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1181">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1182">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1182">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1183">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1183">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1184">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1184">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1185">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1185">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1186">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1186">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1187">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1187">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1188">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1189">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1189">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1190">三个数字 (这些前八位数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1190">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1191">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1191">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1192">四位数的分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1192">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1193">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1193">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1194">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1194">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1195">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1196">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1197">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1199">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1199">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1200">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1200">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1201">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1202">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1203">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1203">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1204">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1205">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1205">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1206">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1206">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1207">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1207">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1208">CNPJ/MF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1208">CNPJ/MF</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1209">CNPJ-MF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1209">CNPJ-MF</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1210">National Registry of Legal Entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1210">National Registry of Legal Entities</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1226">巴西国家标识卡 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1226">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1228">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1228">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1229">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1229">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1230">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1230">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1231">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1231">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1232">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1232">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1233">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1233">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1234">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1234">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1235">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1235">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1236">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1236">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1237">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1237">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1238">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1238">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1239">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1239">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1240">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1240">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1241">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1241">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1242">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1242">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1243">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1244">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1244">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1245">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1246">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1246">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1247">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1247">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1248">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1248">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1249">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1249">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1250">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1251">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1251">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1252">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1254">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1254">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1255">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1255">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1256">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1256">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1257">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1257">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1258">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1258">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1259">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1259">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1260">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1260">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1261">RG（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1261">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1262">RIC（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1262">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1263">保加利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1263">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1264">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1265">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1266">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1266">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1267">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1268">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1268">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1269">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1269">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1270">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1270">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1271">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1271">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1272">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1272">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1273">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1273">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1274">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1274">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1293">保加利亚统一民事号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1293">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1294">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1295">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1295">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1296">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1297">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1297">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1298">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1298">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1299">与出生顺序对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1299">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1300">与性别对应的一位数字：男的偶数位和用于女的奇数位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1300">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1301">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1301">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1302">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1302">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1303">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1303">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1304">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1304">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1305">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1305">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1306">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1306">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1307">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1307">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1308">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1308">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1309">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1309">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1310">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1310">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1311">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1311">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1312">bnn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1312">bnn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1313">bnn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1313">bnn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1314">bucn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1314">bucn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1315">bucn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1315">bucn</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1354">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1354">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1355">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1355">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1356">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1356">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1357">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1357">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1358">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1358">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1359">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1359">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1360">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1360">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1361">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1361">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1362">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1362">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1363">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1363">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1364">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1364">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1365">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1365">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1366">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1366">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1367">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1367">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1368">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1368">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1369">保加利亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1369">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1370">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1370">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1371">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1371">номер на паспорта</span></span>


## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1372">加拿大银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1372">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1373">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1373">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1374">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1374">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1375">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1375">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1376">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1376">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1377">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1377">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1378">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1378">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1379">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1379">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1380">三位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1380">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1381">零 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1381">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1382">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1382">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1383">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1384">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1384">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1385">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1386">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1386">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1387">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1387">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1388">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1388">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1389">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1389">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1390">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1390">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1391">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1391">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1392">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1392">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1416">加拿大驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1416">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1417">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1418">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1418">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1419">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1420">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1420">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1421">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1422">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1422">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1423">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1424">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1425">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1425">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1426">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1426">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1427">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1427">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>


## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1563">加拿大运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1563">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1564">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1565">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1565">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1566">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1567">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1567">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1568">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1569">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1569">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1570">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1571">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1571">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1572">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1572">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1573">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1573">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1585">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1585">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1586">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1587">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1587">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1588">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1589">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1589">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1590">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1591">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1592">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1593">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1593">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1594">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1594">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1595">找到 Keyword_canada_passport_number 或 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1595">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1625">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1625">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1626">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1627">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1627">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1628">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1629">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1629">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1630">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1630">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1631">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1631">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1632">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1632">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1633">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1633">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1634">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1634">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1635">找到 Keyword_canada_phin 或 Keyword_canada_provinces 中至少有两个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1635">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1668">加拿大社会保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1668">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1669">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1669">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1670">9个数字，带可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1670">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1671">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1671">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1672">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1672">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1673">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1673">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1674">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1674">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1675">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1675">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1676">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1676">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1677">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1677">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1678">未格式化：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1678">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1679">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1679">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1680">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1680">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1681">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1681">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1682">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1682">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1683">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1683">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1684">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1684">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1685">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1685">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1686">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1686">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1687">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1687">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1688">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1688">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1689">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1689">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1690">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1690">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1691">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1691">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1692">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1692">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1717">智利标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1717">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1718">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1719">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个校验位或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1719">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1720">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1721">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1721">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1722">一到两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1722">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1723">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1723">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1724">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1724">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1725">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1725">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1726">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1726">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1727">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1727">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1728">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 这是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1728">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1729">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1730">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1730">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1731">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1732">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1732">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1733">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1733">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1734">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1734">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1735">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1735">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1736">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1736">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1737">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1737">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1738">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1738">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1744">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1744">Identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1745">Rol Único Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1745">Rol Único Nacional</span></span>
