- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1751">Tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1751">Tarjeta de identificación</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1752">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1752">Identificación</span></span> 

   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1753">中国居民身份卡片 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1753">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1755">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1755">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1756">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1757">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1757">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1758">6个数字，这是一个地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1758">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1759">8位数，形式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1759">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1760">三个数字，这是一个订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1760">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1761">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1761">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1762">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1763">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1763">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1764">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1765">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1765">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1766">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1766">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1767">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1767">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1768">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1768">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1769">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1769">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1770">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1770">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1771">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1771">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1772">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1772">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1773">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1773">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1774">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1774">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1775">台湾</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1775">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1776">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1776">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1777">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1777">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1778">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1778">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1779">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1779">居民身份证</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1784">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1784">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1785">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1786">14到16个数字，可以设置格式或无格式 (dddddddddddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1786">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1787">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1788">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1788">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1790">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1790">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1793">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1793">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1794">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1794">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1795">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1795">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1796">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1796">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1797">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1797">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1798">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1798">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1799">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1799">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1800">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1800">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-1801">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-1801">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2061">克罗地亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2061">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2062">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2062">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2063">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2064">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2064">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2065">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2066">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2066">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2067">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2067">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2068">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2068">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2069">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2069">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2070">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2070">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2071">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2071">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2072">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2072">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2078">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2078">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2088">克罗地亚 identity 卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2088">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2089">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2089">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2090">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2091">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2091">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2092">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2093">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2093">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2094">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2095">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2095">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2096">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2097">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2098">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2098">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2099">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2099">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2130">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2130">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2131">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2131">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2132">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2133">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2133">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2134">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2135">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2135">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2136">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2137">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2137">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2138">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2139">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2140">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2140">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2141">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2141">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2142">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2142">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2148">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2148">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2149">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2149">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2150">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2150">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2151">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2151">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2152">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2152">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2153">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2153">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2154">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2154">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2155">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2155">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2156">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2156">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2157">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2157">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2158">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2158">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2159">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2159">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2160">找到 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2160">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2161">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2161">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2162">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2163">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2163">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2164">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2164">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2195">克罗地亚社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2195">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2196">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2196">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2197">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2197">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2198">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2198">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2199">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2199">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2200">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2200">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2201">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2201">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2202">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2202">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2203">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2204">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2204">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2205">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2206">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2207">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2207">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2208">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2208">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2209">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2210">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2210">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2227">塞浦路斯驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2227">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2228">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2228">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2229">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2230">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2230">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2231">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2232">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2232">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2233">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2234">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2234">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2235">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2236">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2236">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2237">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2237">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2238">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2238">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2253">塞浦路斯标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2253">Cyprus identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2254">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2254">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2255">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2255">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2256">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2256">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2257">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2257">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2258">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2258">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2259">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2259">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2260">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2260">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2261">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2261">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2262">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2262">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2263">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2263">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2272">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2272">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2273">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2273">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2274">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2275">一个字母后跟6-8 个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2275">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2276">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2277">一个字母后跟6到8个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2277">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2278">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2279">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2279">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2280">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2281">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2281">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2282">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2282">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2283">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2283">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2285">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2285">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2286">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2286">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2288">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2288">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2289">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2289">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2290">塞浦路斯税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2290">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2291">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2291">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2292">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2292">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2293">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2293">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2294">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2294">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2295">"0" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2295">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2296">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2296">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2297">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2297">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2298">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2298">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2299">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2299">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2300">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2300">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2301">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2301">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2302">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2302">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2303">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2303">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2304">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2304">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2305">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2305">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2333">捷克语驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2333">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2334">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2334">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2335">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2335">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2336">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2336">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2337">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2337">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2338">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2338">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2339">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2339">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2340">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2340">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2341">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2341">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2342">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2343">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2343">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2344">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2345">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2345">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2346">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2346">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2347">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2347">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2359">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2359">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2360">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2360">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2361">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2361">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2362">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2362">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2364">捷克语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2364">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2365">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2365">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2366">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2367">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2367">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2368">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2369">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2369">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2370">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2371">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2372">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2373">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2373">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2374">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2374">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2375">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2375">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2376">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2377">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2377">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2378">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2378">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2380">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2380">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2381">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2381">cestovní pas</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2383">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2383">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2384">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2385">9个数字，带可选的正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，可选的正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2385">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2386">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2387"> (旧格式) 的9个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2387">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2388">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2388">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2389">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2389">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2390">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2390">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2391">10个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2391">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2392">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2392">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2393">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2393">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2394">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2394">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2395">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2396">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2396">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2397">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2398">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2398">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2399">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2399">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2400">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2400">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2401">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2401">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2402">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2402">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2403">函数 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2403">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2404">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2404">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2451">捷克社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2451">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2452">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2452">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2453">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2454">指定模式中的10个数字和一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2454">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2455">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2456">10个数字和一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2456">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2457">与出生日期对应的6个数字 (YYMMDD) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2457">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2458">反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2458">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2459">与一个序列号相对应的三个数字，用于分隔出生于同一日期的人员</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2459">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2460">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2460">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2461">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2462">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2462">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2463">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2464">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2464">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2465">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2465">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2466">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2466">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2467">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2467">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2468">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2468">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2484">丹麦驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2484">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2485">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2485">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2486">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2487">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2487">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2488">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2489">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2489">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2490">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2491">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2491">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2492">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2493">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2493">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2494">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2494">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2495">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2495">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2512">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2512">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2513">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2513">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2515">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2515">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2516">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2517">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2517">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2518">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2519">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2519">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2520">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2521">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2521">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2522">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2522">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2523">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2523">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2525">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2525">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2531">丹麦个人身份号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2531">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2532">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2532">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2533">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2533">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2534">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2534">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2535">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2535">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2536">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2536">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2537">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2537">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2538">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2538">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2539">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2539">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2540">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2541">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2541">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2542">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2543">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2543">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2544">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2544">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2545">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2545">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2546">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2546">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2547">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2547">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2548">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2548">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2549">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2549">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2621">丹麦社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2621">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2622">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2622">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2623">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2623">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2624">指定模式中的10个数字和一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2624">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2625">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2625">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2626">10个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2626">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2627">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2627">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2628">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2628">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2629">与序列号对应的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2629">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2630">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2630">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2631">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2631">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2632">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2632">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2633">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2633">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2634">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2634">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2635">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2635">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2636">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2636">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2637">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2637">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2651">药品实施代理 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2651">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2652">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2653">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2653">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2654">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2655">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2655">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2656">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 这组可能的字母： abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是注册人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2656">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2657">一个字母 (不区分大小写) （注册人姓氏的第一个字母）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2657">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2658">七位数字，最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2658">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2659">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2660">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2660">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2661">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2662">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2662">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2663">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2663">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2664">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2664">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2665">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2665">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2666">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2666">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2667">爱沙尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2667">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2668">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2668">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2669">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2669">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2670">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2670">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2671">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2671">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2672">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2672">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2673">字母 "ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2673">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2674">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2674">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2675">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2675">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2676">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2676">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2677">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2677">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2678">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2678">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2679">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2679">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2680">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2680">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2681">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2681">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2682">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2682">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2686">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2686">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2687">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2687">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2688">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2688">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2689">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2689">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2696">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2696">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2698">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2698">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2699">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2700">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2700">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2701">一种数字，对应于性别和出生世纪 (奇数号码男，甚至是女号码，等等。1-2：19世纪;3-4：20世纪;5-6：21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2701">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2702">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2702">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2703">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2703">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2704">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2704">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2705">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2706">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2706">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2707">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2708">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2708">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2709">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2709">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2710">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2710">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2711">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2712">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2712">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2745">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2745">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2746">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2746">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2747">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2747">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2748">一个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2748">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2749">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2749">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2750">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2750">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2751">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2751">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2752">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2752">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2753">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2753">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2754">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2754">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2755">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2755">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2756">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2756">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2758">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2758">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>
