## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2763">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2765">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2766">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2767">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2767">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2768">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2769">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2770">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2771">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2771">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2772">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2773">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2774">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2775">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2776">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2777">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2778">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2779">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-2793">americano espresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-2793">americano espresso</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3225">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3225">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3226">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3226">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3228">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3228">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3229">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3230">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3230">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3231">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3232">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3233">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3233">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3234">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3235">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3235">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3236">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3237">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3237">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3238">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3238">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3239">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3239">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3255">芬兰欧洲健康保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3255">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3256">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3257">20位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3257">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3258">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3259">20位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3259">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3260">10位数-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3260">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3261">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3261">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3262">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3262">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3263">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3263">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3264">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3264">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3265">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3265">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3266">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3267">正则表达式 Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3267">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3268">找到 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3268">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3286">芬兰国家/地区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3286">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3287">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3288">6个数字加上一个字符，表示一个世纪加上三个数字加上校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3288">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3289">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3290">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3290">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3291">6位数，格式格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3291">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3292">世纪标记 (是 "-"、"+" 或 "a" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3292">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3293">三位数的个人标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3293">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3294">不区分大小写的数字或字母 () 是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3294">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3295">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3296">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3297">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3298">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3298">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3299">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3299">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3300">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3300">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3301">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3301">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3302">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3303">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3303">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3304">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3304">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3353">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3353">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3354">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3354">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3355">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3355">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3356">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3356">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3357">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3357">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3358">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3358">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3359">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3359">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3360">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3360">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3361">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3362">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3362">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3363">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3364">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3365">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3365">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3366">找到 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3366">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3367">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3367">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3368">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3368">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3369">登记卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3369">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3370">Passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3370">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3371">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3371">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3372">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3372">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3373">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3373">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3374">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3374">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3375">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3375">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3376">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3376">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3377">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3377">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3378">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3378">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3379">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3379">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3380">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3380">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3381">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3381">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3382">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3382">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3383">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3383">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3384">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3385">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3385">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3386">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3387">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3387">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3388">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3388">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3389">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3389">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3390">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3390">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3391">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3391">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3415">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3415">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3416">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3416">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3417">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3418">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3418">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3419">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3420">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3420">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3421">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3422">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3422">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3423">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3424">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3425">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3425">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3426">至少满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3426">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3427">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3427">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3428">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3428">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3430">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3430">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3431">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3431">drivers licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3433">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3433">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3434">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3434">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3435">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3435">permis de conduire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3436">licence number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3436">licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3437">license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3437">license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3438">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3438">licence numbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3439">license numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3439">license numbers</span></span>


## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3440">法国健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3440">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3441">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3441">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3442">21位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3442">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3443">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3443">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3444">21位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3444">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3445">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3445">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3446">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3446">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3447">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3447">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3448">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3448">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3449">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3449">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3450">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3451">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3452">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3453">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3454">正则表达式 Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3454">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3455">找到 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3455">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3456">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3456">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3457">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3457">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3458">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3458">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3459">vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3459">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3460">d'assuré社交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3460">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3461">法国国家 id 卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3461">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3462">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3462">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3463">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3463">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3464">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3464">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3465">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3465">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3466">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3466">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3467">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3467">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3468">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3468">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3469">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3469">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3470">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3470">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3471">找到 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3471">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3474">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3476">nationale d'idenite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3476">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3477">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3477">cni#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3480">国家/地区标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3480">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3481">国家标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3481">national identity</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3485">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3485">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3486">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3486">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3487">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3487">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3488">9个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3488">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3489">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3489">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3490">9个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3490">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3491">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3491">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3492">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3492">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3493">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3493">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3494">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3495">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3495">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3496">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3497">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3497">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3498">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3498">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3499">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3499">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3501">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3501">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3507">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3507">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3508">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3508">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3509">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3509">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3510">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3510">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3511">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3511">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3512">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3512">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3513">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3513">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3514">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3514">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3515">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3515">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3516">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3516">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3517">Passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3517">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3518">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3518">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3519">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3519">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3520">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3520">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3521">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3521">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3522">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3522">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3523">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3523">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3524">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3524">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3525">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3525">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3526">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3526">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3527">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3527">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3528">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3528">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3530">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3532">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3532">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3533">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3533">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3534">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3534">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3535">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3536">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3536">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3537">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3537">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3538">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3538">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3539">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3539">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3565">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3565">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3566">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3566">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3567">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3567">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3568">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3568">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3569">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3569">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3570">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3570">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3571">1位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3571">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3572">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3572">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3573">2位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3573">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3574">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3574">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3575">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3575">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3576">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3576">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3577">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3577">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3578">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3578">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3579">3个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3579">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3580">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3581">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3581">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3582">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3583">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3583">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3584">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3584">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3585">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3585">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3586">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3586">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3587">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3587">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3606">锡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3606">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3607">法国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3607">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3608">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3609">13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3609">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3610">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3611">13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3611">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3612">两个字母-FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3612">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3613">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3613">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3614">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3614">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3615">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3615">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3616">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3616">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3617">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3617">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3618">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3618">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3619">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3619">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3620">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3620">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3621">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3622">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3622">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3623">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3624">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3624">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3625">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3625">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3626">找到 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3626">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3627">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3627">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3628">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3628">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3641">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3641">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3642">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3642">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3643">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3644">11个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3644">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3645">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3646">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3646">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3647">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3647">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3648">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3648">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3649">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3649">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3650">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3650">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3651">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3651">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3652">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3653">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3653">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3654">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3655">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3655">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3656">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3656">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3657">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3657">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3658">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3658">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3659">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3659">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3660">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3660">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3661">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3661">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3754">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3754">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3755">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3756">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3756">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3757">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3757">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3759">自2010年11月1日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3759">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3760">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3760">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3761">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3761">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3762">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3762">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3763">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3763">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3764">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3764">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3765">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3765">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3766">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3766">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3767">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3767">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3768">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3768">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3769">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3769">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3771">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3771">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3773">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3773">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3774">id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3774">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3775">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3775">identifikation</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3785">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3785">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3786">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3786">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3787">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3788">10个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3788">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3789">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3789">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3790">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3790">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3791">第一个字符是数字或从该集合中的字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3791">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3792">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3792">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3793">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3793">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3794">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3794">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3795">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3795">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3796">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3796">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3797">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3797">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3798">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3798">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3799">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3799">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3800">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3800">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3801">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3801">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3802">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3802">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3803">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3803">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3804">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3804">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3805">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3805">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3817">Keyword_german_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3817">Keyword_german_passport_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3822">bnationalit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3822">bnationalit.t</span></span>


## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3823">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3823">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3824">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3824">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3825">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3825">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3826">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3826">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3827">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3827">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3828">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3828">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3829">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3829">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3830">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3830">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3831">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3831">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3832">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3832">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3833">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3833">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3834">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3834">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3835">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3835">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3836">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3837">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3837">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3838">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3839">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3839">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3840">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3840">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3841">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3841">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3842">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3842">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3843">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3843">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3869">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3869">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3870">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3871">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3871">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3872">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3873">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3873">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3874">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3874">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3875">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3875">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3876">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3876">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3877">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3877">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3878">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3878">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3879">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3879">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3880">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3880">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3881">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3881">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3882">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3883">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3883">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3884">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3885">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3885">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3886">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3886">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3887">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3887">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3888">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3889">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3889">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3890">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3890">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3891">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3891">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3892">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3892">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3893">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3893">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3894">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3894">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3895">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3895">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3896">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3896">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3897">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3897">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3898">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3898">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3899">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3899">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3900">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3900">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3901">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3902">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3902">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3903">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3903">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3904">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3904">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3905">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3906">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3906">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3907">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3908">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3908">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3909">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3909">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3910">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3910">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
