## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3927">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3927">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3928">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3929">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3929">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3930">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3931">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3931">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3932">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3932">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3933">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3933">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3934">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3934">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3935">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3935">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3936">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3936">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3937">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3937">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3938">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3938">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3939">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3940">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3940">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3941">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3942">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3942">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3943">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3943">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3944">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3944">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3945">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3945">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3946">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3946">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3947">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3947">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3948">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3948">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3949">希腊语 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3949">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3950">希腊国家 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3950">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3951">希腊语个人 id 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3951">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3952">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3952">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3953">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3953">identity card</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3957">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3957">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3958">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3958">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3959">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3959">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3960">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3960">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3961">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3961">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3962">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3962">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3963">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3963">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3964">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3964">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3965">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3965">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3966">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3966">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3967">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3967">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3968">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3968">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3970">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3970">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3975">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3975">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3976">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3976">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3977">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3977">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3978">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3978">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3979">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3979">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3980">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3981">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3981">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3982">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3983">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3983">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3984">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3984">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-3985">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-3985">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4014">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4014">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4016">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4016">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4017">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4018">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4018">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4019">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4019">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4020">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4020">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4021">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4021">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4022">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4023">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4023">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4024">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4025">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4025">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4026">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4026">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4027">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4027">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4028">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4028">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4029">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4029">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4030">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4030">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4031">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4031">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4071">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4071">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4072">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4072">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4073">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4074">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4074">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4075">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4076">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4076">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4077">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4077">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4078">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4078">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4079">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4079">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4080">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4080">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4081">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4081">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4082">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4082">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4083">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4083">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4084">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4084">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4100">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4100">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4102">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4102">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4103">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4104">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4104">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4105">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4105">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4106">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4106">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4107">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4107">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4108">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4108">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4109">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4110">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4110">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4111">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4112">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4112">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4113">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4113">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4114">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4114">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4115">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4115">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4116">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4116">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4117">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4117">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4118">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4118">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4119">id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4119">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4120">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4120">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4121">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4121">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4122">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4122">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4123">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4123"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4124">ig。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4124">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4125">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4125">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4126">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4126">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4127">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4127">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4128">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4128">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4129">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4129">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4130">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4130">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4131">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4131">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4132">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4132">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4133">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4134">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4134">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4135">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4136">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4136">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4137">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4137">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4138">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4138">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4139">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4139">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4140">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4140">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4141">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4141">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4142">匈牙利语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4142">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4143">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4143">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4145">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4145">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4146">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4146">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4148">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4148">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4150">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4150">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4151">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4152">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4152">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4153">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4154">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4155">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4155">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4156">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4156">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4157">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4157">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4158">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4158">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4178">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4178">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4179">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4180">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4180">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4181">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4182">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4182">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4183">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4183">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4184">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4184">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4185">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4185">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4186">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4186">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4187">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4187">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4188">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4188">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4189">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4189">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4190">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4190">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4191">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4191">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4192">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4193">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4193">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4219">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4219">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4220">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4220">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4221">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4221">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4222">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4222">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4223">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4223">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4224">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4224">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4225">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4225">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4226">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4226">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4227">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4227">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4228">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4228">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4229">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4229">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4230">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4230">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4231">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4231">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4232">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4232">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4233">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4233">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4234">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4234">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4235">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4235">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4239">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4239">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4240">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4240">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4241">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4241">hungarianvatno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4243">增值税áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4243">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4244">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4244">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4245">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4245">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4246">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4246">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4247">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4247">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4248"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4248">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4249">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4249">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4250">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4250">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4251">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4251">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4252">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4252">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4253">五个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4253">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4254">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4254">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4255">一个字母，是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4255">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4256">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4256">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4257">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4257">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4258">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4258">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4259">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4259">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4260">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4260">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4261">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4261">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4262">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4262">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4264">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4264">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4265">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4265">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4267">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4267">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4269">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4269">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4271">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4271">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4272">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4272">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4273">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4273">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4274">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4274">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4275">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4275">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4276">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4276">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4277">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4277">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4278">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4278">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4279">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4279">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4280">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4280">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4281">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4281">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4282">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4282">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4283">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4283">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4284">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4285">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4285">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4286">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4287">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4287">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4288">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4288">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4289">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4289">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4290">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4290">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4291">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4291">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4292">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4292">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4293">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4293">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4294">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4295">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4295">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4296">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4297">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4297">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4298">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4298">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4299">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4299">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4300">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4300">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4301">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4301">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4302">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4302">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4303">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4303">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4304">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4304">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4305">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4305">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4306">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4306">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4307">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4307">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4308">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4308">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4309">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4309">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4310">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4310">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4311">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4311">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4312">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4312">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4313">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4313">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4314">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4314">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4315">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4315">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4316">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4316">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4317"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4317">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4318">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4319">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4319">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4320">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4321">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4321">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4322">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4322">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4323">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4323">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4324">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4324">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4325">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4325">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-p131">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-p131">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4328">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4328">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4329">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4329">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4330">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4330">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4331">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4331">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4332">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4332">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4333">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4333">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4334">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4334">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4335">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4335">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4336">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4336">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4337">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4337">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4338">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4339">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4339">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4340">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4341">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4341">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4342">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4343">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4344">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4345">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4345">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4346">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4346">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4347">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4347">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4348">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4348">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4349">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4349">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4350">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4350">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4351">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4351">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4352">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4352">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4353">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4353">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4354">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4354">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4355">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4355">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4356">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4356">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4357">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4357">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4358">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4358">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4359">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4359">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4360">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4360">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4361">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4361">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4362">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4362">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4363">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4363">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4364">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4364">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4365">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4365">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4366">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4366">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4367">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4367">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4368">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4368">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4369">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4369">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4370">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4370">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4371">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4371">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4372">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4372">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4373">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4373">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4374">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4374">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4375">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4375">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4376">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4376">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4377">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4377">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4378"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4378">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4379">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4379">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4380">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4381">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4381">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4382">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4383">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4383">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4384">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4384">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4385">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4385">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4386">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4386">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4387">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4387">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4388">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4388">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4389">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4389">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4390">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4390">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4391">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4391">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4392">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4392">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4393">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4393">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4394">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4394">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4395">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4395">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4396">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4396">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4397">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4397">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4398">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4398">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4399">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4399">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4400">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4400">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4401">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4401">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4402">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4402">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4403">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4403">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4404">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4404">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4405">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4405">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4406">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4406">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4407">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4408">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4408">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4409">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4410">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4410">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4411">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4411">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4412">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4412">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4414">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4414">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4428">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4428">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4429">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4429">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4430">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4430">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4431">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4431">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4432">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4432">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4433">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4433">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4434">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4434">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4435">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4435">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4436">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4436">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4437">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4437">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4438">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4438">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4439">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4439">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4440">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4440">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4441">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4441">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4442">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4442">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4443">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4443">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4444">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4444">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4445">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4445">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4446">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4446">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4451">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4451">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4452">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4453">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4453">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4454">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4454">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4455">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4455">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4456">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4456">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4458">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4458">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4459">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4459">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4460">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4460">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4461">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4461">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4462">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4462">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4463">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4463">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4464">一个-I 范围内的可选字母，或 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4464">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4465">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4466">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4466">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4467">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4468">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4468">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4469">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4469">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4470">找到 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4470">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4471">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4471">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4472">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4472">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4473">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4473">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4474">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
