## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4519">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4519">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4520">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4520">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4521">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4521">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4522">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4522">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4523">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4523">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4524">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4524">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4525">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4525">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4526">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4526">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4527">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4527">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4528">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4528">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4529">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4529">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4530">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4530">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4531">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4532">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4532">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4533">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4534">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4535">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4535">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4536">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4536">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4537">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4537">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4538">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4538">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4539">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4539">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4540">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4540">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4541">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4541">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4542">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4542">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4543">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4543">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4544">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4544">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4545">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4545">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4546">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4546">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4547">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4547">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4548">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4549">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4549">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4550">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4551">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4551">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4552">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4552">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4553">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4553">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4554">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4555">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4555">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4556">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4556">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4557">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4557">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4558">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4558">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4559">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4559">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4560">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4560">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4562">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4562">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4563">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4563">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4564">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4564">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4565">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4565">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4566">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4566">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4567">七个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字或下划线字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4567">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4568">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4568">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4569">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4570">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4571">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4572">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4573">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4573">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4574">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4574">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4575">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4575">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4576">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4576">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4577">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4577">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4578">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4578">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4579">意大利会计代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4579">Italy fiscal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4580">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4581">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4581">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4582">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4583">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4583">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4584">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4584">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4585">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4585">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4586">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4586">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4587">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4587">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4588">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4588">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4589">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4589">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4590">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4590">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4591">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4591">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4592">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4592">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4593">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4593">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4594">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4594">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4595">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4595">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4596">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4596">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4597">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4597">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4598">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4598">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4633">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4633">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4634">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4634">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4635">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4636">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4636">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4637">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4638">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4638">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4639">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4639">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4640">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4640">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4641">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4642">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4642">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4643">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4644">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4644">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4645">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4645">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4646">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4646">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4648">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4648">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4658">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4658">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4659">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4660">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4660">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4661">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4662">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4662">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4663">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4663">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4664">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4664">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4665">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4665">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4666">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4666">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4667">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4668">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4668">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4669">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4670">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4670">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4671">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4671">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4672">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4672">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4673">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4673">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4674">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4674">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4675">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4675">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4676">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4676">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4677">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4677">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4679">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4679">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4680">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4680">iva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4681">iva#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4681">iva#</span></span>


## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4682">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4682">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4684">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4684">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4685">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4686">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4686">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4687">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4687">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4688">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4688">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4689">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4689">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4690">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4690">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4691">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4691">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4692">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4693">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4693">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4694">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4695">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4696">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4696">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4697">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4697">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4698">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4698">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4699">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4699">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4700">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4700">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4701">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4701">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4702">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4702">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4703">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4703">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4761">Otemachi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4761">Otemachi</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4762">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4762">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4763">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4764">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4764">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4765">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4766">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4766">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4767">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4768">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4769">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4770">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4771">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4771">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4772">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4772">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4800">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4800">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4801">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4802">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4802">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4803">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4803">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4804">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4804">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4805">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4805">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4806">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4806">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4807">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4807">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4808">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4808">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4809">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4809">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4810">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4810">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4811">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4811">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4812">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4812">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4813">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4814">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4814">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4827">日本我的号码-个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4827">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4828">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4829">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4829">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4830">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4830">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4831">12位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4831">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4832">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4832">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4833">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4833">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4834">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4834">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4835">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4835">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4836">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4836">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4837">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4838">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4839">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4840">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4840">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4841">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4841">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4842">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4842">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4843">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4843">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4844">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4844">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4857">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4857">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4858">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4859">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4859">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4860">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4861">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4861">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4862">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4862">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4863">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4863">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4864">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4864">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4865">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4865">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4866">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4866">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4867">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4867">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4874">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4874">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4875">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4876">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4876">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4877">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4878">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4878">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4879">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4879">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4880">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4880">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4881">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4881">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4882">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4883">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4884">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4885">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4886">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4886">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4887">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4887">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4888">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4888">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4889">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4889">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4890">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4890">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4891">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4891">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4892">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4892">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4893">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4893">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4894">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4894">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4895">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4896">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4896">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4897">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4898">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4898">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4899">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4899">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4900">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4900">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4901">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4901">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4902">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4902">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4903">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4903">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4904">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4904">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4918">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4918">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4919">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4920">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4920">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4921">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4922">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4922">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4923">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4923">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4924">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4924">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4925">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4925">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4926">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4926">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4927">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4927">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4928">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4928">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4929">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4929">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4930">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4930">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4931">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4931">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4932">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4932">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4933">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4933">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4934">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4934">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4935">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4935">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4936">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4936">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4937">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4937">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4938">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4938">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4939">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4939">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4940">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4940">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4941">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4941">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4942">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4942">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4943">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4943">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4944">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4944">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4945">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4946">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4946">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4947">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4948">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4948">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4949">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4949">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4950">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4950">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4951">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4952">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4952">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4953">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4954">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4954">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4955">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4955">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4956">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4956">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4958">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4958">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4961">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4961">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4962">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4962">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4963">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4963">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4964">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4964">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4965">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4965">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4966">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4966">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4967">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4967">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4968">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4968">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4969">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4969">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4970">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4970">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4972">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4972">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4973">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4973">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4974">11个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4974">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4975">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4975">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4976">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4976">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4977">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4977">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4978">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4978">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4979">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4979">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4980">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4980">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4981">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4981">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4982">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4982">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4983">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4983">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4984">两位数 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4984">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4985">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4985">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4986">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4987">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4987">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4988">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4989">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4989">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4990">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4990">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4991">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4991">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4992">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4992">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-4993">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-4993">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5056">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5056">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5057">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5057">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5058">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5059">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5059">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5060">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5061">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5061">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5062">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5062">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5063">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5063">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5064">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5065">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5065">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5066">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5067">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5067">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5068">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5068">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5069">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5069">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5070">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5070">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5071">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5071">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5072">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5072">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5073">拉脱维亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5073">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5074">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5074">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5075">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5075">pase numurs</span></span>    


## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5076">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5076">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5077">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5077">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5078">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5078">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5079">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5079">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5080">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5080">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5081">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5081">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5082">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5082">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5083">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5083">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5084">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5084">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5085">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5085">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5086">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5086">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5087">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5087">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5103">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5103">Lithuania personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5104">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5105">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5105">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5106">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5107">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5107">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5108">一种数字 (1-6) ，对应于个人的性别和出生世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5108">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5109">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5109">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5110">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5110">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5111">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5111">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5112">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5112">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5113">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5113">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5114">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5114">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5115">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5115">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5116">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5116">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5117">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5117">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5118">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5118">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5119">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5119">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5154">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5154">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5155">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5155">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5157">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5157">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5158">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5159">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5159">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5160">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5161">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5161">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5162">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5163">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5163">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5164">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5164">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5165">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5165">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5172">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5172">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5173">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5173">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5174">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5175">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5175">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5176">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5177">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5177">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5178">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5179">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5179">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5180">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5181">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5181">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5182">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5182">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5183">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5183">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5184">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5184">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5185">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5185">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5186">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5186">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5187">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5187">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5188">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5188">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5189">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5189">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5190">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5190">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5191">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5191">drivers license</span></span>
