## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5199">Luxemburg (自然个人的国家标识号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5199">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5200">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5201">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5201">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5202">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5203">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5203">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5204">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5204">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5205">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5205">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5206">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5207">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5207">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5208">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5209">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5209">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5210">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5210">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5211">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5211">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5212">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5213">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5213">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5236">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5236">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5237">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5237">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5238">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5238">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5239">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5239">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5240">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5240">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5241">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5241">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5242">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5242">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5243">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5243">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5244">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5244">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5245">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5245">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5246">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5246">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5247">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5247">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5249">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5249">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5254">Luxemburg 国内标识号 (非自然个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5254">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5255">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5256">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5256">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5257">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5258">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5258">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5259">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5259">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5260">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5260">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5261">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5261">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5262">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5262">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5263">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5263">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5264">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5264">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5265">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5265">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5266">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5266">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5267">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5268">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5268">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5269">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5270">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5270">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5271">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5271">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5272">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5272">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5273">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5273">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5274">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5274">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5292">steuer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5292">steuer id</span></span>

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5314">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5314">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5315">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5316">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5316">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5317">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5318">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5318">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5319">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5319">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5320">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5320">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5321">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5321">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5322">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5322">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5323">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5323">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5324">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5324">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5325">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5325">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5326">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5326">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5327">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5327">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5328">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5328">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5329">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5329">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5330">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5330">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5357">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5357">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5358">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5358">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5359">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5360">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5360">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5361">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5362">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5362">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5363">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5363">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5364">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5364">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5365">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5365">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5366">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5366">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5367">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5367">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5368">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5369">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5369">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5370">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5371">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5371">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5372">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5372">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5373">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5373">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5379">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5379">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5380">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5380">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5381">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5381">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5382">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5382">drivers licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5385">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5385">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5386">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5386">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5387">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5387">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5388">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5388">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5389">马耳他身份卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5389">Malta identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5390">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5390">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5391">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5391">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5392">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5392">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5393">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5393">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5394">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5394">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5395">在 "M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z" (不区分大小写中的一个字母) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5395">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5396">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5397">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5397">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5398">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5399">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5399">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5400">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5400">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5401">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5401">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5402">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5402">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5403">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5403">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5404">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5404">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5405">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5405">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5406">公民服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5406">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5407">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5407">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5408">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5408">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5420">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5420">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5421">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5421">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5422">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5423">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5423">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5424">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5424">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5425">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5425">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5426">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5427">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5427">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5428">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5429">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5429">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5430">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5430">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5431">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5431">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5432">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5432">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5433">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5433">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5434">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5434">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5435">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5435">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5436">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5436">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5437">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5437">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5438">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5438">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5439">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5440">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5440">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5441">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5441">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5442">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5442">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5443">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5443">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5444">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5444">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5445">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5445">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5446">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5446">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5447">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5447">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5448">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5448">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5449">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5449">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5450">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5451">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5451">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5452">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5453">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5454">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5454">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5455">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5455">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5456">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5456">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5457">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5457">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5490">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5490">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5491">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5491">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5492">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5492">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5493">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5494">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5494">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5495">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5495">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5496">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5496">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5497">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5497">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5498">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5498">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5499">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5499">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5500">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5501">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5501">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5502">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5503">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5503">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5504">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5504">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5505">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5505">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5506">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5507">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5507">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5508">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5508">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5509">bsn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5509">bsn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5510">bsn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5510">bsn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5511">burgerservicenummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5511">burgerservicenummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5512">公民服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5512">citizen service number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5530">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5530">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5531">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5531">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5532">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5533">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5533">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5534">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5535">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5535">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5536">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5537">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5537">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5538">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5539">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5540">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5540">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5541">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5541">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5559">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5559">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5560">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5562">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5562">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5563">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5564">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5564">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5565">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5566">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5566">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5567">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5568">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5569">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5569">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5570">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5570">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5580">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5580">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5581">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5582">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5582">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5583">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5584">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5584">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5585">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5586">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5586">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5587">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5588">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5588">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5589">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5589">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5590">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5590">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5591">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5591">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5592">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5592">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5630">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5630">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5631">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5632">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5632">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5633">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5633">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5634">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5634">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5635">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5635">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5636">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5636">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5637">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5637">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5638">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5638">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5639">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5639">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5640">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5640">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5641">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5641">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5642">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5642">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5643">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5643">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5644">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5644">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5645">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5645">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5646">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5646">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5647">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5647">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5648">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5648">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5649">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5649">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5658">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5658">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5659">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5660">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5660">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5661">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5662">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5662">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5663">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5663">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5664">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5664">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5665">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5665">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5666">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5666">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5667">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5667">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5668">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5668">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5669">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5669">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5670">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5670">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5671">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5672">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5672">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5673">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5674">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5674">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5675">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5675">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5676">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5676">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5677">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5678">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5678">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5686">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5686">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5687">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5687">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5688">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5688">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5689">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5689">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5690">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5690">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5691">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5691">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5692">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5692">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5693">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5694">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5694">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5695">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5696">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5697">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5697">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5698">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5698">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5699">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5699">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5700">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5700">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5767">新西兰 inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5767">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5768">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5769">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5769">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5770">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5771">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5771">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5772">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5772">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5773">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5773">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5774">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5774">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5775">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5775">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5776">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5776">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5777">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5777">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5778">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5778">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5779">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5779">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5780">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5780">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5781">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5781">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5782">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5782">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5783">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5783">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5784">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5784">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5786">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5786">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5787">ird。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5787">ird no.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5789">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5789">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5790">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5790">new zealand ird</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5793">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5793">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5794">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5795">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5795">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5797">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5797">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5798">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5799">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5799">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5800">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5801">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5802">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5802">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5803">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5803">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5804">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5804">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5805">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5805">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5806">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5806">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>
