- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5808">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5808">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5809">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5809">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5810">治疗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5810">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5811">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5811">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5812">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5813">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5813">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5814">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5815">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5815">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5816">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5816">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5817">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5817">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5818">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5818">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5819">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5819">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5820">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5820">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5821">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5822">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5823">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5824">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5824">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5825">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5825">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5826">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5826">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5827">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5827">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5828">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5828">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5829">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5829">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5830">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5830">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5831">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5831">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5832">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5832">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5833">社会 welfare 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5833">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5834">社会 welfare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5834">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5835">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5835">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5836">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5836">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5838">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5838">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5840">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5840">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5841">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5841">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5842">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5842">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5843">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5843">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5844">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5844">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5845">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5845">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5846">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5846">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5847">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5847">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5848">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5848">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5849">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5849">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5850">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5850">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5851">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5851">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5852">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5852">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5853">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5853">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5854">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5854">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5855">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5855">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5856">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5856">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5857">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5857">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5858">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5858">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5859">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5859">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5860">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5860">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5861">Fødselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5861">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5862">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5862">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5863">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5864">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5864">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5865">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5866">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5866">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5867">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5867">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5868">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5868">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5869">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5869">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5870">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5870">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5871">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5871">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5872">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5873">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5873">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5874">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5875">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5875">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5876">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5876">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5877">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5877">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5878">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5878">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5879">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5879">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5880">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5880">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5881">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5881">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5882">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5882">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5883">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5883">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5884">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5884">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5885">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5885">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5886">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5887">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5887">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5888">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5888">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5889">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5889">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5890">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5890">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5891">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5891">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5892">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5892">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5893">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5893">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5894">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5894">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5895">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5896">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5896">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5897">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5898">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5898">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5899">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5899">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5900">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5900">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5901">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5901">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5902">Keywords_poland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5902">Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5903">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5903">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5904">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5904">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5905">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5905">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5906">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5906">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5907">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5907">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5908">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5908">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5909">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5909">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5910">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5910">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5911">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5911">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5912">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5912">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5913">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5913">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5914">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5914">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5915">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5915">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5916">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5916">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5917">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5917">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5918">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5918">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5919">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5919">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5920">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5920">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5921">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5922">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5922">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5923">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5924">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5924">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5925">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5925">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5926">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5926">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5927">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5927">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5928">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5928">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5929">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5929">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5930">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5930">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5931">器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5931">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5932">Nazwa i 器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5932">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5933">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5933">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5934">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5934">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5935">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5935">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5936">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5936">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5937">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5937">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5938">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5938">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5939">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5940">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5940">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5941">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5941">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5942">表示出生日期的6个数字 YYMMDD 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5942">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5943">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5943">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5944">1校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5944">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5945">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5946">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5946">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5947">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5948">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5948">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5949">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5949">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5950">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5950">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5951">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5952">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5952">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5953">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5953">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5954">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5954">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5955">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5955">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5956">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5956">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5957">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5957">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5958">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5958">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5959">niepowtarzalny 器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5959">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5960">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5960">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5961">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5961">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5962">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5962">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5963">器 identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5963">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5964">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5964">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5965">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5965">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5966">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5966">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5967">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5967">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5968">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5969">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5969">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5970">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5971">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5971">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5972">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5972">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5973">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5973">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5974">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5974">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5975">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5975">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5976">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5976">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5977">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5977">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5978">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5978">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5979">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5979">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5980">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5980">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5981">器 paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5981">Numer paszportu</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5984">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5984">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5985">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5985">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5987">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5987">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5988">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5989">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5989">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5990">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5990">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5991">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5991">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5992">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5992">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5993">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5993">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5994">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5995">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5995">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5996">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5997">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5997">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5998">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5998">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-5999">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-5999">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6000">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6000">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6001">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6001">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6007">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6007">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6008">regon 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6008">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6009">regonid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6009">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6010">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6010">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6011">公司 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6011">company id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6015">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6015">numeru regon</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6018">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6018">Poland tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6019">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6019">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6020">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6020">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6021">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6021">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6022">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6022">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6023">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6024">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6024">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6025">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6026">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6026">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6027">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6027">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6028">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6028">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6029">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6029">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6030">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6030">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6036">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6036">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6037">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6037">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6038">免税#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6038">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6058">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6058">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6059">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6060">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6060">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6061">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6062">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6062">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6063">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6064">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6064">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6065">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6066">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6066">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6067">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6067">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6068">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6068">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6078">identification number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6088">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6088">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6089">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6089">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6090">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6091">两个字母后跟指定模式中的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6091">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6092">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6093">两个字母后跟七个包含特殊字符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6093">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6094">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6094">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6095">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6096">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6096">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6097">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6097">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6098">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6098">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6099">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6100">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6100">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6101">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6102">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6102">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6103">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6103">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6104">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6104">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6116">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6116">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6117">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6117">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6120">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6120">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6121">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6121">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6122">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6123">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6123">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6124">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6125">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6125">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6126">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6126">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6127">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6127">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6128">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6129">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6129">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6130">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6131">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6131">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6132">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6132">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6133">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6133">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6134">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6134">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6135">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6135">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6136">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6136">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6138">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6138">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6139">número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6139">número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6140">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6140">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6141">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6142">9个带可选空格的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6142">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6143">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6143">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6144">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6144">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6145">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6145">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6146">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6146">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6147">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6147">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6148">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6148">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6149">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6150">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6150">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6151">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6152">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6152">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6153">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6153">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6154">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6154">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6155">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6155">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6156">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6156">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />

        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6181">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6181">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6182">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6182">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6184">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6184">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6186">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6186">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6187">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6187">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6188">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6188">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6189">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6189">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6190">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6190">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6191">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6191">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6192">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6193">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6193">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6194">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6194">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6210">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6210">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6211">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6212">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6212">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6213">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6213">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6214">1-9 的1位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6214">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6215">代表出生日期 (YYMMDD 的6个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6215">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6216">2位数，可以为01-52 或99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6216">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6217">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6217">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6218">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6219">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6219">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6220">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6221">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6221">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6222">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6222">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6223">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6223">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6224">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6224">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6225">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6225">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6273">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6273">unique identity number</span></span>

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6276">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6276">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6277">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6277">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6278">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6279">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6279">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6280">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6280">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6281">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6281">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6282">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6283">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6283">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6284">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6285">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6285">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6286">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6286">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6287">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6287">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6288">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6288">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6289">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6289">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6290">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6290">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6292">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6292">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6293">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6293">numărul pașaportului</span></span>


## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6294">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6294">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6295">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6296">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6296">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6297">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6297">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6298">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6298">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6299">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6299">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6300">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6300">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6301">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6301">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6302">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6302">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6303">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6303">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6304">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6304">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6305">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6305">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6306">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6306">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6307">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6307">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6308">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6308">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6309">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6309">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6326">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6326">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6328">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6328">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6329">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6330">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6330">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6331">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6331">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6332">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6332">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6333">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6333">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6334">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6334">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6335">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6335">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6336">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6336">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6337">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6337">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6338">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6338">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6339">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6339">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6356">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6356">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6357">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6358">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6358">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6359">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6360">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6360">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6361">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6362">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6362">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6363">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6364">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6365">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6365">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6366">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6366">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6367">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6367">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6368">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6368">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6369">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6369">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6370">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6370">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6371">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6371">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6372">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6372">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6373">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6373">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6374">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6375">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6375">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6376">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6376">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6377">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6377">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6378">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6378">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6379">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6379">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6380">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6380">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6381">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6381">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6382">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6382">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6383">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6383">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6384">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6384">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6385">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6385">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6386">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6386">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6387">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6387">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6388">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6388">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6389">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6389">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6390">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6390">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6401">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6401">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6402">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6402">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6403">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6404">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6404">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6405">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6406">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6406">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6407">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6407">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6408">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6408">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6409">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6409">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6410">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6410">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6411">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6411">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6412">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6412">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6413">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6413">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6414">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6414">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
