## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6430">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6430">Slovakia personal number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6432">九或十个数字，包含可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6432">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6433">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6433">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6434">代表出生日期的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6434">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6435">可选的斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6435">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6436">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6436">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6437">1可选校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6437">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6438">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6438">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6439">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6439">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6440">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6440">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6441">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6441">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6442">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6442">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6443">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6443">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6444">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6444">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6445">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6445">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6492">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6492">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6493">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6493">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6494">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6495">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6495">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6496">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6497">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6497">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6498">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6499">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6499">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6500">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6501">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6502">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6502">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6503">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6503">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6505">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6505">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6506">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6506">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6508">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6508">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6510">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6510">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6511">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6511">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6512">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6512">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6513">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6513">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6514">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6514">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6515">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6515">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6516">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6516">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6517">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6517">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6518">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6518">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6519">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6519">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6520">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6520">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6521">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6521">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6537">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6537">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6539">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6539">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6540">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6541">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6541">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6542">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6542">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6543">两个数字，对应于出生区域 "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6543">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6544">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6544">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6545">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6545">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6546">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6547">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6547">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6548">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6549">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6549">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6550">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6550">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6551">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6551">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6552">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6552">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6553">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6553">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6581">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6581">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6582">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6582">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6583">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6583">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6584">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6584">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6585">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6585">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6586">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6586">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6587">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6587">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6588">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6588">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6589">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6589">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6590">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6591">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6591">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6592">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6593">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6593">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6594">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6594">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6595">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6595">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6602">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6602">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6603">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6604">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6604">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6605">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6605">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6606">一个从1-9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6606">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6607">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6607">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6608">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6608">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6609">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6609">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6610">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6610">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6611">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6611">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6612">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6612">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6613">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6613">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6614">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6614">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6615">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6615">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6616">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6616">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6640">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6640">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6641">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6642">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6642">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6643">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6644">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6644">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6645">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6645">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6646">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6646">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6647">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6647">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6648">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6648">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6649">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6649">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6650">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6651">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6652">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6653">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6654">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6654">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6655">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6655">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6656">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6656">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6657">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6657">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6662">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6662">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6663">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6664">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6664">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6665">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6666">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6666">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6667">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6667">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6668">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6668">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6669">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6669">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6670">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6670">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6671">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6671">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6672">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6672">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6673">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6674">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6674">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6675">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6676">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6676">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6677">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6677">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6678">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6678">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6679">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6679">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6680">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6680">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6681">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6681">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6682">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6682">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6688">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6688">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6690">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6690">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6691">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6691">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6693">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6693">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6694">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6695">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6695">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6696">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6696">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6697">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6697">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6698">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6699">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6699">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6700">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6701">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6701">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6702">函数  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6702">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6703">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6703">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6740">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6740">Spain DNI</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6741">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6742">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6742">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6743">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6744">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6744">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6745">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6745">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6746">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6746">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6747">一个检查信函 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6747">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6748">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6749">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6750">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6751">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6751">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6752">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6752">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6753">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6753">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6754">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6754">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6755">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6755">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6779">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6779">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6780">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6780">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6781">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6781">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6782">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6782">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6783">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6783">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6784">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6784">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6785">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6785">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6786">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6786">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6787">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6787">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6788">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6789">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6789">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6790">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6791">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6791">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6792">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6792">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6793">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6793">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6803">西班牙 pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6803">españa pasaporte</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6805"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6805">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6806">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6806">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6807">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6807">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6808">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6808">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6809">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6809">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6810">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6810">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6811">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6811">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6812">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6812">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6813">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6813">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6814">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6814">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6815">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6815">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6816">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6817">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6817">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6818">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6819">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6819">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6820">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6820">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6821">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6822">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6822">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6823">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6823">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6824">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6824">Spain tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6826">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6826">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6827">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6828">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6828">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6829">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6829">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6830">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6830">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6831">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6831">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6832">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6832">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6833">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6833">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6834">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6834">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6835">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6835">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6836">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6836">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6837">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6837">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6838">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6838">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6839">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6839">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6840">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6840">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6841">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6841">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6842">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6842">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6843">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6843">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6844">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6844">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6845">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6845">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6846">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6846">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6847">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6847">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6848">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6848">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6849">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6849">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6850">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6850">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6851">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6851">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6852">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6852">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6853">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6853">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6854">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6854">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6885">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6885">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6886">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6887">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6887">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6888">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6888">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6889">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6889">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6890">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6890">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6891">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6891">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6892">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6892">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6893">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6893">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6894">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6894">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6895">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6895">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6896">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6897">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6897">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6898">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6899">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6899">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6900">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6900">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6901">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6901">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6902">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6902">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6903">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6903">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6931">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6931">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6932">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6932">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6933">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6934">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6934">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6935">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6936">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6936">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6937">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6937">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6938">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6938">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6939">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6939">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6940">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6941">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6941">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6942">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6943">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6944">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6944">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6945">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6945">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6950">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6950">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6951">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6951">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6952">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6952">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6953">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6953">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6954">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6954">drivers licence</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6961">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6961">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6962">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6962">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6963">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6963">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6964">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6964">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6965">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6965">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6966">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6966">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6967">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6967">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6968">"-" 或 "+" 的分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6968">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6969">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6969">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6970">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6970">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6971">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6971">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6972">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6972">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6973">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6973">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6974">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6974">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6975">找到了 from 关键字 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6975">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6976">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6976">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6977">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6977">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6978">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6978">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6979">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6979">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6998">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6998">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-6999">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-6999">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7000">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7001">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7001">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7002">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7003">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7003">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7004">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7005">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7005">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7006">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7007">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7007">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7008">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7008">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7009">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7009">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7010">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7010">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7011">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7011">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7042">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7042">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7043">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7043">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7044">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7045">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7045">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7046">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7047">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7047">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7048">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7048">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7049">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7049">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7050">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7050">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7051">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7051">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7052">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7052">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7053">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7054">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7054">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7055">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7056">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7056">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7057">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7057">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7058">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7058">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7059">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7059">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7060">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7060">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7076">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7076">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7078">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7078">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7079">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7080">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7080">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7081">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7081">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7082">正号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7082">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7083">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7083">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7084">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7084">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7085">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7085">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7086">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7086">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7087">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7087">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7088">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7088">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7089">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7089">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7090">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7090">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7091">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7091">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7092">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7092">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7093">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7093">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7094">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7094">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7120">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7120">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7121">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7122">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7122">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7123">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7124">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7124">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7125">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7125">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7126">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7126">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7127">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7127">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7128">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7128">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7129">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7129">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7130">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7131">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7132">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7133">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7133">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7134">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7134">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7135">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7135">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7169">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7169">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7170">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7170">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7171">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7171">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7172">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7172">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7173">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7173">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7174">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7174">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7175">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7175">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7176">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7176">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7177">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7177">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7178">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7178">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7179">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7179">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7180">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7180">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7181">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7182">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7183">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7184">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7184">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7185">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7185">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7186">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7186">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7187">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7187">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7188">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7188">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
