numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7208">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7209">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7209">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7210">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7211">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7211">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7212">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7213">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7213">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7214">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7214">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7215">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7215">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7216">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7216">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7217">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7217">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7218">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7218">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7219">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7219">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7220">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7220">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7221">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7221">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7222">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7222">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7223">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7224">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7224">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7225">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7225">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7226">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7226">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7227">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7227">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7228">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7228">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7229">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7229">身份證字號</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7243">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7243">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7244">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7244">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7245">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7245">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7246">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7246">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7247">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7247">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7248">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7248">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7249">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7249">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7250">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7250">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7251">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7251">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7252">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7252">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7253">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7254">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7254">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7255">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7256">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7257">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7257">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7258">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7258">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7259">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7259">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7260">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7260">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7261">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7261">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7262">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7262">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7263">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7263">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7264">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7264">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7265">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7265">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7266">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7266">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7267">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7267">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7268">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7268">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7269">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7269">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7270">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7271">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7271">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7272">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7273">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7273">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7274">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7274">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7275">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7275">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7276">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7277">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7277">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7278">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7279">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7280">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7280">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7281">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7281">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7282">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7282">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7283">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7283">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7284">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7284">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7285">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7285">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7286">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7286">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7287">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7287">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7288">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7288">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7289">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7289">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7290">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7290">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7291">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7291">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7292">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7292">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7293">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7293">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7294">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7294">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7295">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7295">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7296">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7297">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7297">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7298">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7299">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7299">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7300">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7300">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7301">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7301">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7302">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7302">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7303">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7303">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7304">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7304">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7305">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7305">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7306">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7306">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7307">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7307">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7308">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7308">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7309">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7309">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7311">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7311">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7312">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7312">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7313">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7313">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7314">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7314">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7315">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7315">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7316">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7316">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7317">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7317">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7318">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7318">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7319">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7319">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7320">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7320">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7321">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7321">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7322">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7322">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7323">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7324">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7325">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7326">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7327">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7327">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7328">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7328">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7329">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7329">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7330">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7330">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7331">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7331">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7332">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7332">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7333">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7333">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7334">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7334">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7335">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7335">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7336">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7336">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7337">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7337">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7338">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7338">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7339">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7339">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7340">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7341">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7341">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7342">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7343">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7343">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7344">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7344">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7345">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7345">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7346">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7346">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7347">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7347">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7348">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7348">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7349">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7350">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7351">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7352">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7352">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7353">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7353">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7354">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7354">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7355">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7355">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7365">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7365">motorcycles</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7370">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7370">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7371">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7371">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7372">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7372">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7373">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7373">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7374">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7374">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7375">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7376">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7376">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7377">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7378">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7378">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7379">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7379">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7380">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7380">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7381">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7381">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7382">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7382">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7383">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7383">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7384">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7384">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7386">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7386">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7391">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7391">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7392">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7392">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7394">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7394">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7395">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7396">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7396">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7397">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7397">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7398">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7398">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7399">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7399">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7400">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7400">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7401">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7401">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7402">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7402">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7403">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7403">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7404">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7404">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7405">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7405">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7406">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7406">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7407">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7407">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7408">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7408">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7409">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7409">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7410">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7410">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7411">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7411">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7412">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7412">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7413">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7413">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7414">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7414">national health service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7416">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7416">health services authority</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7422">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7422">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7423">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7423">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7424">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7424">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7425">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7425">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7426">D. B。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7426">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7427">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7427">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7428">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7428">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7429">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7429">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7430">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7430">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7431">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7431">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7432">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7433">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7433">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7434">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7435">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7435">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7436"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7436">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7437">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7437">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7438">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7438">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7439">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7439">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7440">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7440">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7441">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7441">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7442">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7442">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7443">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7443">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7444">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7444">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7445">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7445">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7446">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7446">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7447">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7447">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7448">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7448">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7449">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7449">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7450">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7450">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7451">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7451">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7452">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7452">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7453">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7453">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7454">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7454">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7455">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7455">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7456">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7456">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7457">未找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7457">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7479">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7479">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7480">唯一的纳税人参考号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7480">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7481">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7482">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7482">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7483">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7484">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7484">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7485">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7486">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7486">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7487">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7488">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7489">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7489">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7490">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7490">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7510">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7510">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7511">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7511">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7512">8-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7512">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7513">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7513">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7514">8-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7514">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7515">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7516">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7516">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7517">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7518">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7518">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7519">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7519">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7520">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7520">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7550">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7550">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7551">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7552">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7552">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7553">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7554">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7554">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7555">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7555">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7556">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7556">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7557">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7558">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7558">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7559">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7560">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7560">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7561">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7561">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7562">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7562">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7563">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7563">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7564">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7564">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7565">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7565">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7566">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7566">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7567">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7567">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7568">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7568">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7666">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7666">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7667">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7668">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7668">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7669">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7670">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7670">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7671">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7671">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7672">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7672">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7673">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7673">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7674">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7674">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7675">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7675">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7676">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7676">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7677">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7677">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7678">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7678">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7679">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7679">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7680">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7680">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7681">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7681">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7682">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7682">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7683">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7683">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7684">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7684">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7685">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7685">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7686">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7686">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7687">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7687">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7688">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7688">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7689">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7689">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7690">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7690">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7691">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7691">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7692">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7692">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7693">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7693">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7694">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7694">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7695">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7695">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7696">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7696">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7697">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7697">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7698">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7698">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7719"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7719">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7720">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7721">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7721">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7722">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7722">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7723">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7724">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7724">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7725">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7725">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7726">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7726">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7727">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7727">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7728">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7728">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7729">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7730">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7730">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7731">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7732">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7732">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7733">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7733">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7734">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7734">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7735">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7735">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7736">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7736">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7737">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7737">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7738">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7738">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7739">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7739">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7740">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7740">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7741">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7741">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7742">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7742">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7743">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7743">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7749">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7749">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7750">社会保障号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7750">social security no</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7758">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7758">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7759">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7759">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7762">Format</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7766">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7767">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7767">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7768">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7769">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7769">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7770">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7770">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7771">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7771">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7772">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7772">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7773">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7773">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7774">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7774">Passport Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7775">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7775">Passport No</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7776">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7776">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7777">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7777">Passport#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7778">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7778">PassportID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7779">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7779">Passportno</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7780">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7780">passportnumber</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7781">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7781">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7782">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7782">パスポート番号</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7792">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7792">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7793">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7794">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7794">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7795">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7796">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7796">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7797">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7798">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7798">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7799">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7800">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7800">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7801">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7801">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7802">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7802">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7805">乌克兰护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7805">ukraine passport</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7811">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7811">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7812">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7813">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7813">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7814">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7815">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7815">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7816">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7816">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7817">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7817">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7818">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7819">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7819">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7820">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7821">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7821">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7822">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7822">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="33ef3-7823">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="33ef3-7823">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
